verbs.description: Evidence of [ARG0: congregations] [V: ratcheting] up [ARG1: the political rhetoric] is not just anecdotal . Polling shows that 14 % of church attendees report being encouraged to vote for or against a specific candidate during the 2016 election , while a Wall Street Journal headline earlier this month declared that “ Anti - Trump activism is reviving protestant churches . ”
